desc.en: Aris plays and thoroughly enjoys the Game Development Department's previous title, Tales Saga Chronicle. The club members are touched by her glowing response.

desc.en: Momoi and Midori discussed the possibility of disguising Aris as a Millennium student. Momoi was in charge of getting a falsified student ID card, while Midori and Yuzu would teach Aris how to "speak", in the hope of correcting her fixed speech pattern.

desc.zh_tw: 桃井和綠討論將愛麗絲偽裝成千年學生計劃的可行性。桃井負責去拿到假學生證，而綠和柚子負責教愛麗絲“說話”，希望將其高度機械化的語音模式修改過來。

desc.en: Momoi left in advance and Midori was troubled with how to teach. At this moment Aris found a magazine about the game they made before. Midori then decided to let Aris try their games, attempting to teach her with in-game dialogues.

desc.zh_tw: 桃井先行離開，綠為如何教愛麗絲說話而苦惱著。這時，愛麗絲則發現了一本曾經寫著他們做的遊戲的雜誌。綠於是決定讓愛麗絲玩玩自己的遊戲，試著用遊戲中的對話教會愛麗絲。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 桃井先行离开，绿为如何教爱丽丝说话而苦恼着。这时，爱丽丝则发现了一本曾经写着他们做的游戏的杂志。绿于是决定让爱丽丝玩玩自己的游戏，试着用游戏中的对话教会爱丽丝。

desc.en: With the help of Momoi and Midori, Aris was able to reach the True End within 3 hours. When asked about the comments on the game, Aris thought it was fun. Hearing this, Yuzu stepped out of the wardrobe, thanking Aris sincerely.

desc.zh_tw: 在桃井和綠兩人的幫助下，愛麗絲在三小時內通關了True End。兩人問及愛麗絲對遊戲的評價時，愛麗絲認為遊戲很有意思，聽到此言的柚子終於從櫃子裡出來了。柚子真誠地對愛麗絲道了謝。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 在桃井和绿两人的帮助下，爱丽丝在三小时内通关了True End。两人问及爱丽丝对游戏的评价时，爱丽丝认为游戏很有意思，听到此言的柚子终于从柜子里出来了。柚子真诚地对爱丽丝道了谢。

desc.en: The Millennium Prize, which gives recognition to the Millennium School's best inventions, awards the Game Development Department a special prize for the development of Tales Saga Chronicle 2. Thanks to this, the club is saved from getting shut down. In the midst of everyone's celebrations, the gaming device installed with the G.BIBLE starts to operate on its own.

desc.en: The result was announced by the Kotori from the Engineering Department. Seven were awarded, but none from the GDD. In despair, Momoi broke the TV with her guns. Everyone was sentimental. Although Yuzu said that she could return to her dorm with courage, Aris became the most worrying one for everyone.

desc.zh_tw: 比賽結果由工程部的亞都梨釋出，總共有七個獲獎專案。然而七個播報玩都不見開發部的TSC2，桃井絕望之下用槍掃射了螢幕。大家都很感傷，柚子雖然表示自己有勇氣回到宿舍，但愛麗絲的去向卻成為了眾人最擔心的一點。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 比赛结果由工程部的柯托莉发布，总共有七个获奖项目。然而七个播报玩都不见开发部的TSC2，桃井绝望之下用枪扫射了屏幕。大家都很感伤，柚子虽然表示自己有勇气回到宿舍，但爱丽丝的去向却成为了众人最担心的一点。

desc.en: Yuuka visits the GDD, congratulating they won a reward. As the TV was broken, everyone watched the live stream on their phones. On site, the reviewer spoke highly of the elements for a retro RPG that TSC2 possesses, and therefore a special award was given.
desc.jp: Yuuka visits the GDD, congratulating they won a reward. As the TV was broken, everyone watched the live stream on their phones. On site, the reviewer spoke highly of the elements for a retro RPG that TSC2 possesses, and therefore a special award was given.

desc.ko: Yuuka visits the GDD, congratulating they won a reward. As the TV was broken, everyone watched the live stream on their phones. On site, the reviewer spoke highly of the elements for a retro RPG that TSC2 possesses, and therefore a special award was given.
desc.zh_tw: 優香拜訪遊戲開發部，慶祝所有人取得獎項。因為電視機被打穿，眾人在手機上觀看了直播。直播中，頒獎員高度讚揚了TSC2作為復古RPG的要素，並由此授予了他們特別獎。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 优香拜访游戏开发部，庆祝所有人取得奖项。因为电视机被打穿，众人在手机上观看了直播。直播中，颁奖员高度赞扬了TSC2作为复古RPG的要素，并由此授予了他们特别奖。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 优香拜访游戏开发部，庆祝所有人取得奖项。因为电视机被打穿，众人在手机上观看了直播。直播中，颁奖员高度赞扬了TSC2作为复古RPG的要素，并由此授予了他们特别奖。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 优香拜访游戏开发部，庆祝所有人取得奖项。因为电视机被打穿，众人在手机上观看了直播。直播中，颁奖员高度赞扬了TSC2作为复古RPG的要素，并由此授予了他们特别奖。

desc.en: The GDD got rid of the crisis of being closed. Yuuka and Maki expressed their appreciation. The two most upvote comments were nothing but the praise for TSC2. Yuuka announced the decision to postpone the closure and apologized to Momoi. Aris become the member of the GDD formally.
desc.jp: The GDD got rid of the crisis of being closed. Yuuka and Maki expressed their appreciation. The two most upvote comments were nothing but the praise for TSC2. Yuuka announced the decision to postpone the closure and apologized to Momoi. Aris become the member of the GDD formally.
desc.thai: The GDD got rid of the crisis of being closed. Yuuka and Maki expressed their appreciation. The two most upvote comments were nothing but the praise for TSC2. Yuuka announced the decision to postpone the closure and apologized to Momoi. Aris become the member of the GDD formally.
desc.ko: The GDD got rid of the crisis of being closed. Yuuka and Maki expressed their appreciation. The two most upvote comments were nothing but the praise for TSC2. Yuuka announced the decision to postpone the closure and apologized to Momoi. Aris become the member of the GDD formally.
desc.zh_tw: 開發部最終免於廢社，就連優香和真紀都給出了好評，最熱門的兩條評論也滿是對TSC2的稱讚。優香宣佈了暫緩廢社的決定，並向桃井抱歉。愛麗絲正式成為開發部成員。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 开发部最终免于废社，就连优香和真纪都给出了好评，最热门的两条评论也满是对TSC2的称赞。优香宣布了暂缓废社的决定，并向桃井抱歉。爱丽丝正式成为开发部成员。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 开发部最终免于废社，就连优香和真纪都给出了好评，最热门的两条评论也满是对TSC2的称赞。优香宣布了暂缓废社的决定，并向桃井抱歉。爱丽丝正式成为开发部成员。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 开发部最终免于废社，就连优香和真纪都给出了好评，最热门的两条评论也满是对TSC2的称赞。优香宣布了暂缓废社的决定，并向桃井抱歉。爱丽丝正式成为开发部成员。

desc.en: In the abandoned factory, the Game Development Department finds a humanoid robot by the name of Aris. For the sake of the club, Momoi brings Aris back to their club room to induct her as a new member.
desc.jp: In the abandoned factory, the Game Development Department finds a humanoid robot by the name of Aris. For the sake of the club, Momoi brings Aris back to their club room to induct her as a new member.
desc.thai: In the abandoned factory, the Game Development Department finds a humanoid robot by the name of Aris. For the sake of the club, Momoi brings Aris back to their club room to induct her as a new member.
desc.ko: In the abandoned factory, the Game Development Department finds a humanoid robot by the name of Aris. For the sake of the club, Momoi brings Aris back to their club room to induct her as a new member.
desc.zh_tw: 遊戲開發部一行人，在廢棄工廠遇到長得像人類的機器人少女，愛麗絲。桃井為了阻止遊戲開發部被廢社，於是便把愛麗絲帶到社團活動室，打算讓她成為社團成員。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部一行人，在废弃工厂遇到长得像人类的机器人少女，爱丽丝。桃井为了阻止游戏开发部被废社，于是便把爱丽丝带到社团活动室，打算让她成为社团成员。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 游戏开发部一行人，在废弃工厂遇到长得像人类的机器人少女，爱丽丝。桃井为了阻止游戏开发部被废社，于是便把爱丽丝带到社团活动室，打算让她成为社团成员。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 游戏开发部一行人，在废弃工厂遇到长得像人类的机器人少女，爱丽丝。桃井为了阻止游戏开发部被废社，于是便把爱丽丝带到社团活动室，打算让她成为社团成员。

desc.en: The three ran into the factory and found no robots continuing chasing them. Right at the moment, the facility's built-in system began identifying them and recognized Sensei, granting them permission to proceed. They dropped to the bottom thanks to the door opened at the floor.
desc.jp: The three ran into the factory and found no robots continuing chasing them. Right at the moment, the facility's built-in system began identifying them and recognized Sensei, granting them permission to proceed. They dropped to the bottom thanks to the door opened at the floor.
desc.thai: The three ran into the factory and found no robots continuing chasing them. Right at the moment, the facility's built-in system began identifying them and recognized Sensei, granting them permission to proceed. They dropped to the bottom thanks to the door opened at the floor.
desc.ko: The three ran into the factory and found no robots continuing chasing them. Right at the moment, the facility's built-in system began identifying them and recognized Sensei, granting them permission to proceed. They dropped to the bottom thanks to the door opened at the floor.
desc.zh_tw: 三人跑進了工廠裡，發現機器人不再跟隨。就在這時，設施裡的系統開始識別三人身份，並認出了老師，給三人發放了通行權限。三人從地板打開的門掉了下去。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 三人跑进了工厂里，发现机器人不再跟随。就在这时，设施里的系统开始识别三人身份，并认出了老师，给三人发放了通行权限。三人从地板打开的门掉了下去。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 三人跑进了工厂里，发现机器人不再跟随。就在这时，设施里的系统开始识别三人身份，并认出了老师，给三人发放了通行权限。三人从地板打开的门掉了下去。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 三人跑进了工厂里，发现机器人不再跟随。就在这时，设施里的系统开始识别三人身份，并认出了老师，给三人发放了通行权限。三人从地板打开的门掉了下去。

desc.en: The three fell one by one, and thankfully Sensei was at the bottom providing some buffer.
desc.jp: The three fell one by one, and thankfully Sensei was at the bottom providing some buffer.
desc.thai: The three fell one by one, and thankfully Sensei was at the bottom providing some buffer.

desc.zh_tw: 三人相繼掉了下去，還好老師在底下做了些許緩衝。這時，桃井發現了什麼東西。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 三人相继掉了下去，还好老师在底下做了些许缓冲。这时，桃井发现了什么东西。

desc.en: In one sinkhole, the three found Aris who was asleep, as well as some text like "AL-1S". Momoi took pity on her and decided to take her back to Millennium. She also gave her own clothes for Aris to wear on. Aris woke up right after the interaction with Sensei.
desc.jp: In one sinkhole, the three found Aris who was asleep, as well as some text like "AL-1S". Momoi took pity on her and decided to take her back to Millennium. She also gave her own clothes for Aris to wear on. Aris woke up right after the interaction with Sensei.
desc.thai: In one sinkhole, the three found Aris who was asleep, as well as some text like "AL-1S". Momoi took pity on her and decided to take her back to Millennium. She also gave her own clothes for Aris to wear on. Aris woke up right after the interaction with Sensei.
desc.ko: In one sinkhole, the three found Aris who was asleep, as well as some text like "AL-1S". Momoi took pity on her and decided to take her back to Millennium. She also gave her own clothes for Aris to wear on. Aris woke up right after the interaction with Sensei.
desc.zh_tw: 三人在廢墟的一個天坑里發現了睡著著的愛麗絲，發現了“AL-1S”之類的字樣。綠可憐愛麗絲，便決定將她帶回千年，還給她穿上了自己的衣服。就在這時，愛麗絲因與老師接觸而醒了過來。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 三人在废墟的一个天坑里发现了睡着着的爱丽丝，发现了“AL-1S”之类的字样。绿可怜爱丽丝，便决定将她带回千年，还给她穿上了自己的衣服。就在这时，爱丽丝因与老师接触而醒了过来。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 三人在废墟的一个天坑里发现了睡着着的爱丽丝，发现了“AL-1S”之类的字样。绿可怜爱丽丝，便决定将她带回千年，还给她穿上了自己的衣服。就在这时，爱丽丝因与老师接触而醒了过来。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 三人在废墟的一个天坑里发现了睡着着的爱丽丝，发现了“AL-1S”之类的字样。绿可怜爱丽丝，便决定将她带回千年，还给她穿上了自己的衣服。就在这时，爱丽丝因与老师接触而醒了过来。

desc.en: Momoi took Aris back to the club room and Midori was shocked. Knowing barely anything, Aris started tossing the stuffs in the club room, like putting controllers and game consoles into month. Momoi then talked about her plan: she wanted to let Aris pretend to be a student at here, solving the club member number problem.
desc.jp: Momoi took Aris back to the club room and Midori was shocked. Knowing barely anything, Aris started tossing the stuffs in the club room, like putting controllers and game consoles into month. Momoi then talked about her plan: she wanted to let Aris pretend to be a student at here, solving the club member number problem.

Momoi then talked about her plan: she wanted to let Aris pretend to be a student at here, solving the club member number problem.
desc.zh_tw: 桃井將愛麗絲帶回到社團活動室，綠非常驚詫。愛麗絲因為不懂，開始亂動社團的東西，比如把手柄和遊戲機塞進嘴里之類。桃井隨後說出了自己的計劃：她想讓愛麗絲偽裝成千年的學生加入社團，解決人數不夠被廢社的問題。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 桃井将爱丽丝带回到社团活动室，绿非常惊诧。爱丽丝因为不懂，开始乱动社团的东西，比如把手柄和游戏机塞进嘴里之类。桃井随后说出了自己的计划：她想让爱丽丝伪装成千年的学生加入社团，解决人数不够被废社的问题。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 桃井将爱丽丝带回到社团活动室，绿非常惊诧。爱丽丝因为不懂，开始乱动社团的东西，比如把手柄和游戏机塞进嘴里之类。桃井随后说出了自己的计划：她想让爱丽丝伪装成千年的学生加入社团，解决人数不够被废社的问题。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 桃井将爱丽丝带回到社团活动室，绿非常惊诧。爱丽丝因为不懂，开始乱动社团的东西，比如把手柄和游戏机塞进嘴里之类。桃井随后说出了自己的计划：她想让爱丽丝伪装成千年的学生加入社团，解决人数不够被废社的问题。

desc.en: In order to read the G.BIBLE, the Game Development Department needs to decrypt the password. To do so, they reach out to Veritas. Maki tells them they'll need the Mirror that was confiscated by the Student Council. To retrieve it, they'll need to get into the contraband storage guarded by the Maid Club.

desc.zh_tw: 遊戲開發部為了解讀暗號閱覽<G.Bible>而向<貝里塔斯>諮詢。真紀回答說，如果想解讀暗號，需要有被學生會扣押的駭客工具<鏡子>。一行人為了拿回<鏡子>，便前往由女僕部看守的學生會扣押品保管所。

desc.en: Hare from Veritas brought a bad news to everyone: Momoi's game saves could not be recovered. Momoi cried out after hearing this. Maki, by analyzing the file's metadata, confirmed its genuity, but was unable to crack the password.
desc.jp: Hare from Veritas brought a bad news to everyone: Momoi's game saves could not be recovered. Momoi cried out after hearing this. Maki, by analyzing the file's metadata, confirmed its genuity, but was unable to crack the password.

desc.zh_tw: 貝里塔斯的晴首先為大家帶來了壞消息：桃井的遊戲存檔不可恢復，桃井聽到立刻哭了起來。不過，真紀通過分析文件元數據，確認了文件的真實性，但卻無法破解密碼。

desc.en: For Maki's reference, she thought that it is possible if they were just extracting the encrypted files rather than cracking the password. Yet a tool specifically designed to do so, called "Mirror", was confiscated by the Seminar recently. As a tool created by the president, Veritas intended to retrieve it back, which made an unexpected collision with the GDD. As a result, they purposed to raid Millennium's Seminar.
desc.jp: For Maki's reference, she thought that it is possible if they were just extracting the encrypted files rather than cracking the password. Yet a tool specifically designed to do so, called "Mirror", was confiscated by the Seminar recently. As a tool created by the president, Veritas intended to retrieve it back, which made an unexpected collision with the GDD. As a result, they purposed to raid Millennium's Seminar.

desc.zh_tw: 真紀認為，如果能直接提取出加密文件而不是破解密碼，應該還能行得通。然而一款正是照此設計的工具“鏡子”卻被學生會沒收。因為是部長製作的工具，貝里塔斯也打算將其取回——這與開發部眾人不謀而合，於是他們便提出要突襲千年學生會。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 真纪认为，如果能直接提取出加密文件而不是破解密码，应该还能行得通。然而一款正是照此设计的工具“镜子”却被学生会没收。因为是部长制作的工具，贝里塔斯也打算将其取回——这与开发部众人不谋而合，于是他们便提出要突袭千年学生会。

desc.en: Momoi still held her concern on whether participating or not, but Midori had already decided it: the GDD is an important place for everyone to gather and laugh, and she wanted to protect all of this. Having played more than 40 RPG games, Aris concluded that it's nothing more important than friends alongside in an adventure. Hare appreciated that and asked Sensei to let the Engineering Department join them as well.

desc.en: Satisfied with Aris' answers, Yuuka admits Aris as an official member of the club, but remains adamant about shutting down the Game Development Department if their next game doesn't come together. Once again, the club members head to the ruins in search of G.BIBLE.
desc.jp: Satisfied with Aris' answers, Yuuka admits Aris as an official member of the club, but remains adamant about shutting down the Game Development Department if their next game doesn't come together. Once again, the club members head to the ruins in search of G.BIBLE.
desc.thai: Satisfied with Aris' answers, Yuuka admits Aris as an official member of the club, but remains adamant about shutting down the Game Development Department if their next game doesn't come together. Once again, the club members head to the ruins in search of G.BIBLE.
desc.ko: Satisfied with Aris' answers, Yuuka admits Aris as an official member of the club, but remains adamant about shutting down the Game Development Department if their next game doesn't come together. Once again, the club members head to the ruins in search of G.BIBLE.
desc.zh_tw: 經過幾輪問答後，優香同意讓愛麗絲成為正式成員。但她威脅說，如果還是做不出好遊戲就會關閉遊戲開發部。遊戲開發部全員再次前往廢墟尋找<G.Bible>。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 经过几轮问答后，优香同意让爱丽丝成为正式成员。但她威胁说，如果还是做不出好游戏就会关闭游戏开发部。游戏开发部全员再次前往废墟寻找<G.Bible>。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 经过几轮问答后，优香同意让爱丽丝成为正式成员。但她威胁说，如果还是做不出好游戏就会关闭游戏开发部。游戏开发部全员再次前往废墟寻找<G.Bible>。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 经过几轮问答后，优香同意让爱丽丝成为正式成员。但她威胁说，如果还是做不出好游戏就会关闭游戏开发部。游戏开发部全员再次前往废墟寻找<G.Bible>。

desc.en: Though the speech pattern is somewhat odd, but Yuuka could already feel Aris' love towards games. Therefore, she acknowledged her identity as a member of the Game Development Club. Yet she also said that due to a sudden change to the related rules, they would still get closed if they couldn't make any products at the end of this month.

Yet she also said that due to a sudden change to the related rules, they would still get closed if they couldn't make any products at the end of this month.

desc.zh_tw: 雖然說話很奇怪，但優香業已感受到愛麗絲對遊戲的熱愛，由此承認了她是遊戲開發部的一員。然而優香表示，由於規定突然變更，若月底拿不出成績，無論什麼社團都會被廢除。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 虽然说话很奇怪，但优香业已感受到爱丽丝对游戏的热爱，由此承认了她是游戏开发部的一员。然而优香表示，由于规定突然变更，若月底拿不出成绩，无论什么社团都会被废除。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 虽然说话很奇怪，但优香业已感受到爱丽丝对游戏的热爱，由此承认了她是游戏开发部的一员。然而优香表示，由于规定突然变更，若月底拿不出成绩，无论什么社团都会被废除。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 虽然说话很奇怪，但优香业已感受到爱丽丝对游戏的热爱，由此承认了她是游戏开发部的一员。然而优香表示，由于规定突然变更，若月底拿不出成绩，无论什么社团都会被废除。

desc.en: Utaha and others welcomed them, and Hibiki took the initiative to choose weapons for Aris. But Aris soon put her attention onto a railgun, which was them introduced by Kotori. She mentioned that the development was terminated due to funding issues. All of the Engineering Department thought Aris couldn't lift it up, but Aris had not only lifted it, but also left a hole on the club room; as a last resort, the Engineering Department challenged the Game Development Club, who can take it away if they won them.
desc.jp: Utaha and others welcomed them, and Hibiki took the initiative to choose weapons for Aris. But Aris soon put her attention onto a railgun, which was them introduced by Kotori. She mentioned that the development was terminated due to funding issues. All of the Engineering Department thought Aris couldn't lift it up, but Aris had not only lifted it, but also left a hole on the club room; as a last resort, the Engineering Department challenged the Game Development Club, who can take it away if they won them.

She mentioned that the development was terminated due to funding issues. All of the Engineering Department thought Aris couldn't lift it up, but Aris had not only lifted it, but also left a hole on the club room; as a last resort, the Engineering Department challenged the Game Development Club, who can take it away if they won them.
desc.ko: Utaha and others welcomed them, and Hibiki took the initiative to choose weapons for Aris. But Aris soon put her attention onto a railgun, which was them introduced by Kotori. She mentioned that the development was terminated due to funding issues. All of the Engineering Department thought Aris couldn't lift it up, but Aris had not only lifted it, but also left a hole on the club room; as a last resort, the Engineering Department challenged the Game Development Club, who can take it away if they won them.
desc.zh_tw: 詠葉等工程師部的學生歡迎了開發部一行人。響主動提出要為愛麗絲找武器，但愛麗絲很快把注意力放到了一門軌道炮上。亞都梨主動為愛麗絲介紹了這門傑作，提到由於資金問題這門大砲的研發已經終止。工程師部眾人本以為愛麗絲無法舉起它，但後者不僅拿起了它，還不小心給房頂開了個洞；不得已，工程師部決定測試遊戲開發部眾人的能力，達標後才能拿走。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 歌原等工程师部的学生欢迎了开发部一行人。响主动提出要为爱丽丝找武器，但爱丽丝很快把注意力放到了一门轨道炮上。柯托莉主动为爱丽丝介绍了这门杰作，提到由于资金问题这门大炮的研发已经终止。工程师部众人本以为爱丽丝无法举起它，但后者不仅拿起了它，还不小心给房顶开了个洞；不得已，工程师部决定测试游戏开发部众人的能力，达标后才能拿走。

desc.en: After receiving a bizarre letter, Sensei heads over to the Game Development Department and meets Midori and Momoi, two twins hard at work developing video games.

desc.zh_tw: 老師收到一封怪信，於是便前往千年學園的遊戲開發部，在該處見到開發遊戲中的雙胞胎學生，綠和桃井。

desc.en: Arona is the system manager of the Shittim Chest in Blue Archive, who is set to be a personal assistant for Sensei. She is overall blue, recalling the game title Blue Archive. Though being cute, Arona seldom brings Sensei a 3-star student when recruiting, which is unknown for being either accidentally or intentionally. In Chinese (Traditional) translation, Arona is called "彩奈", with the "彩" (rainbow) indicating the color of the letter for a 3-star student; from some aspects, it might be an intensional case for wishing more 3-star students.

desc.zh_tw: 彩奈(英文名 Arona 直譯為 阿羅娜)是蔚藍檔案中的“什錦之箱”中的系統管理員，設定上是一個輔助老師的個人小助理。彩奈的整體色調是藍色，與遊戲名稱“蔚藍檔案”相呼應。儘管長得很可愛，彩奈在幫助老師招募學生時卻經常會不出三星，具體是故意還是不小心的就不得人知了。從某種層面上看，繁中有意在其名字中加入“彩”一字，大概也是寄託著出彩的希望（bushi）。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿罗娜(Arona)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。阿罗娜的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，阿罗娜在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。国际服繁中将其称呼为“彩奈”，某种层面上看可能是在希望阿罗娜能够多出点彩（bushi）。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 彩奈(英文名 Arona 直译为 阿罗娜)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。彩奈的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，彩奈在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。从某种层面上看，繁中有意在其名字中加入“彩”一字，大概也是寄托着出彩的希望（bushi）。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 彩奈(英文名 Arona 直译为 阿罗娜)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。彩奈的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，彩奈在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。从某种层面上看，繁中有意在其名字中加入“彩”一字，大概也是寄托着出彩的希望（bushi）。

desc.en: As it turns out, G.BIBLE only contains a simple maxim: "Love video games." Their sky-high expectations dashed, the Game Development Department, with the help of Aris, begin development on Tales Saga Chronicle 2.
desc.jp: As it turns out, G.BIBLE only contains a simple maxim: "Love video games." Their sky-high expectations dashed, the Game Development Department, with the help of Aris, begin development on Tales Saga Chronicle 2.
desc.thai: As it turns out, G.BIBLE only contains a simple maxim: "Love video games." Their sky-high expectations dashed, the Game Development Department, with the help of Aris, begin development on Tales Saga Chronicle 2.
desc.ko: As it turns out, G.BIBLE only contains a simple maxim: "Love video games." Their sky-high expectations dashed, the Game Development Department, with the help of Aris, begin development on Tales Saga Chronicle 2.
desc.zh_tw: 結果事與願違，<G.Bible>的内容只是「請熱愛遊戲吧」這句單純的句子。這讓遊戲開發部的學生們跌入失落的深淵。在愛麗絲的打氣下，遊戲開發部重新振作起來,著手開發<傳說年代記2>。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 结果事与愿违，<G.Bible>的内容只是「请热爱游戏吧」这句单纯的句子。这让游戏开发部的学生们跌入失落的深渊。在爱丽丝的打气下，游戏开发部重新振作起来,着手开发<传说年代记2>。

desc.en: Everyone was disappointed. Aris expressed her like for TSC and wanted to make TSC2 with others. Yuzu voiced her approval.
desc.jp: Everyone was disappointed. Aris expressed her like for TSC and wanted to make TSC2 with others. Yuzu voiced her approval.
desc.thai: Everyone was disappointed. Aris expressed her like for TSC and wanted to make TSC2 with others. Yuzu voiced her approval.
desc.ko: Everyone was disappointed. Aris expressed her like for TSC and wanted to make TSC2 with others. Yuzu voiced her approval.
desc.zh_tw: 開發部眾人感到十分沮喪。愛麗絲表達了對TSC的喜愛，因此想要與眾人將TSC2製作下去。柚子本人也罕見地表達了支援。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 开发部众人感到十分沮丧。爱丽丝表达了对TSC的喜爱，因此想要与众人将TSC2制作下去。柚子本人也罕见地表达了支持。

desc.en: Yuzu recalled the flooding negative comments in the days after the release of TSC. Her self-confidence was greatly damaged. The door was knocked at then, and initially Yuzu thought it was an angry player, but didn't expect to be Midori and Momoi. Both not only spoke highly of TSC, but would also become the members of the GDD afterwards.
desc.jp: Yuzu recalled the flooding negative comments in the days after the release of TSC. Her self-confidence was greatly damaged. The door was knocked at then, and initially Yuzu thought it was an angry player, but didn't expect to be Midori and Momoi. Both not only spoke highly of TSC, but would also become the members of the GDD afterwards.

desc.zh_tw: 柚子回想起了TSC發行後幾天漫天的差評言論，自尊心大受損傷。這時門突然被敲想，柚子本以為是憤怒的玩家上門，卻不想迎來了桃井和綠，兩位不僅對TSC評價很高，而且將會成為開發部的成員。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 柚子回想起了TSC发行后几天漫天的差评言论，自尊心大受损伤。这时门突然被敲想，柚子本以为是愤怒的玩家上门，却不想迎来了桃井和绿，两位不仅对TSC评价很高，而且将会成为开发部的成员。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 柚子回想起了TSC发行后几天漫天的差评言论，自尊心大受损伤。这时门突然被敲想，柚子本以为是愤怒的玩家上门，却不想迎来了桃井和绿，两位不仅对TSC评价很高，而且将会成为开发部的成员。

desc.en: Yuuka visits the Game Development Department to screen their new member's eligibility. Aris practices the art of self-introduction with Midori and Momoi.
desc.jp: Yuuka visits the Game Development Department to screen their new member's eligibility. Aris practices the art of self-introduction with Midori and Momoi.

desc.ko: Yuuka visits the Game Development Department to screen their new member's eligibility. Aris practices the art of self-introduction with Midori and Momoi.
desc.zh_tw: 優香為了審查新成員的資格而來到遊戲開發部,於是愛麗 絲便與綠及桃井一起練習自我介紹。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 优香为了审查新成员的资格而来到游戏开发部,于是爱丽丝便与绿及桃井一起练习自我介绍。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 优香为了审查新成员的资格而来到游戏开发部,于是爱丽丝便与绿及桃井一起练习自我介绍。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 优香为了审查新成员的资格而来到游戏开发部,于是爱丽丝便与绿及桃井一起练习自我介绍。

desc.en: Momoi was confident that Aris would be able to pass the screening easily, while Midori didn't think so. Momoi then decided to test that, but the result was not looking good.
desc.jp: Momoi was confident that Aris would be able to pass the screening easily, while Midori didn't think so. Momoi then decided to test that, but the result was not looking good.
desc.thai: Momoi was confident that Aris would be able to pass the screening easily, while Midori didn't think so. Momoi then decided to test that, but the result was not looking good.
desc.ko: Momoi was confident that Aris would be able to pass the screening easily, while Midori didn't think so. Momoi then decided to test that, but the result was not looking good.
desc.zh_tw: 桃井自信地認為愛麗絲能夠通過優香的資格審查，而綠則對此仍有顧慮。桃井於是測試愛麗絲的能力，但仍然不很盡人意。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 桃井自信地认为爱丽丝能够通过优香的资格审查，而绿则对此仍有顾虑。桃井于是测试爱丽丝的能力，但仍然不很尽人意。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 桃井自信地认为爱丽丝能够通过优香的资格审查，而绿则对此仍有顾虑。桃井于是测试爱丽丝的能力，但仍然不很尽人意。

desc.en: Yuuka visited the Department and met Aris. Pretty surprised, she said that she had never met such an adorable child. Midori mentioned about the closure stuff; Yuuka said that due to a change on procedure, the eligibility review is inevitable. Yuuka immediately started her questioning.

desc.zh_tw: 優香視察遊戲開發部，遇見了愛麗絲。優香表示自己從來沒見過這麼可愛的孩子，桃井立刻提出廢社事宜。優香表示由於程序變更，資格審查不可避免；她隨即開始了對愛麗絲的提問。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 优香视察游戏开发部，遇见了爱丽丝。优香表示自己从来没见过这么可爱的孩子，桃井立刻提出废社事宜。优香表示由于程序变更，资格审查不可避免；她随即开始了对爱丽丝的提问。

desc.en: The Game Development Department makes it to a rundown factory. As if by instinct, Aris is drawn to the computer which contains G.BIBLE. She's able to download the data onto her gaming device...
desc.jp: The Game Development Department makes it to a rundown factory. As if by instinct, Aris is drawn to the computer which contains G.BIBLE. She's able to download the data onto her gaming device...

desc.zh_tw: 遊戲開發部一行人抵達目的地——位於廢墟的工廠。愛麗絲在那裡靠直覺找到儲存<G.Bible>的電腦，並且成功把資料下載到遊戲機裡。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部一行人抵达目的地——位于废墟的工厂。爱丽丝在那里靠直觉找到储存<G.Bible>的电脑，并且成功把资料下载到游戏机里。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 游戏开发部一行人抵达目的地——位于废墟的工厂。爱丽丝在那里靠直觉找到储存<G.Bible>的电脑，并且成功把资料下载到游戏机里。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 游戏开发部一行人抵达目的地——位于废墟的工厂。爱丽丝在那里靠直觉找到储存<G.Bible>的电脑，并且成功把资料下载到游戏机里。

desc.en: Everyone made the way to the factory. Aris suddenly remembered something and went away on her own. They followed Aris and found a computer running a system called "Divi: Sion".
desc.jp: Everyone made the way to the factory. Aris suddenly remembered something and went away on her own. They followed Aris and found a computer running a system called "Divi: Sion".

desc.ko: Everyone made the way to the factory. Aris suddenly remembered something and went away on her own. They followed Aris and found a computer running a system called "Divi: Sion".
desc.zh_tw: 眾人到達了工廠，但愛麗絲卻突然記起了什麼，自顧自的行動。眾人跟隨著愛麗絲，找到了一台搭載著“Divi: Sion”系統的電腦。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 众人到达了工厂，但爱丽丝却突然记起了什么，自顾自的行动。众人跟随着爱丽丝，找到了一台搭载着“Divi: Sion”系统的电脑。

desc.en: The computer recognized Aris but was about to shut down due to low battery, with data on board going to be lost as well. To get the G.Bible saved on it, Momoi gave away her game console and her game saves. At last the data was secured, but it required a password to access. Momoi complained and unintentionally attracted the robots.

To get the G.Bible saved on it, Momoi gave away her game console and her game saves. At last the data was secured, but it required a password to access. Momoi complained and unintentionally attracted the robots.

desc.zh_tw: 電腦認出了愛麗絲，但突然電量不足即將關機，數據被毀在即；為了得到其存儲的《G.Bible》，桃井獻出了自己的遊戲機與存檔。數據得以保存，但需密碼才可訪問；桃井大聲抱怨，結果引來了機器人。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 电脑认出了爱丽丝，但突然电量不足即将关机，数据被毁在即；为了得到其存储的《G.Bible》，桃井献出了自己的游戏机与存档。数据得以保存，但需密码才可访问；桃井大声抱怨，结果引来了机器人。

desc.en: The Game Development Department submits Tales Saga Chronicle 2 just before their deadline. Right after it uploads, the club room suddenly becomes the target of a shootout.
desc.jp: The Game Development Department submits Tales Saga Chronicle 2 just before their deadline. Right after it uploads, the club room suddenly becomes the target of a shootout.
desc.thai: The Game Development Department submits Tales Saga Chronicle 2 just before their deadline. Right after it uploads, the club room suddenly becomes the target of a shootout.
desc.ko: The Game Development Department submits Tales Saga Chronicle 2 just before their deadline. Right after it uploads, the club room suddenly becomes the target of a shootout.
desc.zh_tw: 遊戲開發部一行人勉強趕上截止期限，完成了<傳說年代記2>的開發。上傳遊戲後，遊戲開發部社團活動室遭到來歷不明的槍擊。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部一行人勉强赶上截止期限，完成了<传说年代记2>的开发。上传游戏后，游戏开发部社团活动室遭到来历不明的枪击。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 游戏开发部一行人勉强赶上截止期限，完成了<传说年代记2>的开发。上传游戏后，游戏开发部社团活动室遭到来历不明的枪击。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 游戏开发部一行人勉强赶上截止期限，完成了<传说年代记2>的开发。上传游戏后，游戏开发部社团活动室遭到来历不明的枪击。

desc.en: The shooter was Neru, the president of the Maid Club. Claiming that her last battle with Aris had piqued her interest, Neru challenges Aris to a fight. One destructive battle later, and Neru, satisfied, goes on her way.
desc.jp: The shooter was Neru, the president of the Maid Club. Claiming that her last battle with Aris had piqued her interest, Neru challenges Aris to a fight. One destructive battle later, and Neru, satisfied, goes on her way.
desc.thai: The shooter was Neru, the president of the Maid Club. Claiming that her last battle with Aris had piqued her interest, Neru challenges Aris to a fight. One destructive battle later, and Neru, satisfied, goes on her way.
desc.ko: The shooter was Neru, the president of the Maid Club. Claiming that her last battle with Aris had piqued her interest, Neru challenges Aris to a fight. One destructive battle later, and Neru, satisfied, goes on her way.
desc.zh_tw: 對社團活動室發動槍擊的，是女僕部的部長寧瑠。寧瑠說對上次的戰鬥大感興趣，並對愛麗絲提出挑戰。經過好一陣混戰才滿足地回去。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 对社团活动室发动枪击的，是女仆部的部长尼禄。尼禄说对上次的战斗大感兴趣，并对爱丽丝提出挑战。经过好一阵混战才满足地回去。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 对社团活动室发动枪击的，是女仆部的部长宁瑠。宁瑠说对上次的战斗大感兴趣，并对爱丽丝提出挑战。经过好一阵混战才满足地回去。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 对社团活动室发动枪击的，是女仆部的部长宁瑠。宁瑠说对上次的战斗大感兴趣，并对爱丽丝提出挑战。经过好一阵混战才满足地回去。

desc.en: The GDD finally finished it at the very last moment. Momoi uploaded the demo for everyone to download. The comments started flowing in, as the download counter counting fast. When everyone was worried and nervous, the club room was hit by some bullet shots. Everyone began to engage.
desc.jp: The GDD finally finished it at the very last moment. Momoi uploaded the demo for everyone to download. The comments started flowing in, as the download counter counting fast. When everyone was worried and nervous, the club room was hit by some bullet shots. Everyone began to engage.
desc.thai: The GDD finally finished it at the very last moment. Momoi uploaded the demo for everyone to download. The comments started flowing in, as the download counter counting fast. When everyone was worried and nervous, the club room was hit by some bullet shots. Everyone began to engage.
desc.ko: The GDD finally finished it at the very last moment. Momoi uploaded the demo for everyone to download. The comments started flowing in, as the download counter counting fast. When everyone was worried and nervous, the club room was hit by some bullet shots. Everyone began to engage.
desc.zh_tw: 開發部眾人終於在最後一刻完成了作品，桃井提出要將demo上傳到網上供大家下載。評論開始湧來，下載量也在激增，而就在眾人緊張不安時，社團突然被幾發炮彈擊中。眾人開始迎戰。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 开发部众人终于在最后一刻完成了作品，桃井提出要将demo上传到网上供大家下载。评论开始涌来，下载量也在激增，而就在众人紧张不安时，社团突然被几发炮弹击中。众人开始迎战。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 开发部众人终于在最后一刻完成了作品，桃井提出要将demo上传到网上供大家下载。评论开始涌来，下载量也在激增，而就在众人紧张不安时，社团突然被几发炮弹击中。众人开始迎战。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 开发部众人终于在最后一刻完成了作品，桃井提出要将demo上传到网上供大家下载。评论开始涌来，下载量也在激增，而就在众人紧张不安时，社团突然被几发炮弹击中。众人开始迎战。

desc.en: Neru came and challenged the GDD. Neru praised for Yuzu's courage at first, then challenged Aris into a battle. She claimed that if Aris could defeat her, then everything from the past would no longer be investigated. Before she could react, Aris fired the Sword of Light in advance.
desc.jp: Neru came and challenged the GDD. Neru praised for Yuzu's courage at first, then challenged Aris into a battle. She claimed that if Aris could defeat her, then everything from the past would no longer be investigated. Before she could react, Aris fired the Sword of Light in advance.

desc.zh_tw: 尼祿前來挑戰開發部眾人。尼祿先是稱讚了柚子的勇氣，然後向愛麗絲髮出挑戰，提出只要能打敗她，以前的事情就一筆勾銷。尼祿還沒反應過來，愛麗絲就搶先發射了光之劍。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 尼禄前来挑战开发部众人。尼禄先是称赞了柚子的勇气，然后向爱丽丝发出挑战，提出只要能打败她，以前的事情就一笔勾销。尼禄还没反应过来，爱丽丝就抢先发射了光之剑。

desc.en: Though Neru has a significant advantage in melee combat, but Aris, by pointing the railgun towards the floor and firing it, retreated at the cost of injuring herself 48%. Neru didn't pursue afterwards.

desc.en: Aris stays up all night playing through all of the Game Development Department's recommended video games, and by the end of it, has learned to speak more like a regular person. Momoi gives Aris what she'll need to blend in as a student at the Millennium School.
desc.jp: Aris stays up all night playing through all of the Game Development Department's recommended video games, and by the end of it, has learned to speak more like a regular person. Momoi gives Aris what she'll need to blend in as a student at the Millennium School.
desc.thai: Aris stays up all night playing through all of the Game Development Department's recommended video games, and by the end of it, has learned to speak more like a regular person. Momoi gives Aris what she'll need to blend in as a student at the Millennium School.
desc.ko: Aris stays up all night playing through all of the Game Development Department's recommended video games, and by the end of it, has learned to speak more like a regular person. Momoi gives Aris what she'll need to blend in as a student at the Millennium School.
desc.zh_tw: 愛麗絲玩遊戲開發部學生推薦的遊戲玩了一整晚，已經學會人類說話的口吻了。桃井遞給愛麗絲各種能偽裝成千年學園學生的物品。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 爱丽丝玩游戏开发部学生推荐的游戏玩了一整晚，已经学会人类说话的口吻了。桃井递给爱丽丝各种能伪装成千年学园学生的物品。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 爱丽丝玩游戏开发部学生推荐的游戏玩了一整晚，已经学会人类说话的口吻了。桃井递给爱丽丝各种能伪装成千年学园学生的物品。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 爱丽丝玩游戏开发部学生推荐的游戏玩了一整晚，已经学会人类说话的口吻了。桃井递给爱丽丝各种能伪装成千年学园学生的物品。

desc.en: Yuzu reintroduced herself to Aris and wanted to recommend RPG games to her. Upon hearing this, the other two joined in too. Aris played games day and night, completing them at an incredible rate.

desc.en: Akane apologizes to Neru for her failures, but Neru is more interested in how Aris managed to go toe-to-toe with the Maid Club. Back at the club room, the Game Development Department tries to use the Mirror to decrypt G.BIBLE.
desc.jp: Akane apologizes to Neru for her failures, but Neru is more interested in how Aris managed to go toe-to-toe with the Maid Club. Back at the club room, the Game Development Department tries to use the Mirror to decrypt G.BIBLE.
desc.thai: Akane apologizes to Neru for her failures, but Neru is more interested in how Aris managed to go toe-to-toe with the Maid Club. Back at the club room, the Game Development Department tries to use the Mirror to decrypt G.BIBLE.
desc.ko: Akane apologizes to Neru for her failures, but Neru is more interested in how Aris managed to go toe-to-toe with the Maid Club. Back at the club room, the Game Development Department tries to use the Mirror to decrypt G.BIBLE.
desc.zh_tw: 戰鬥後，朱音對任務失敗一事向寧瑠道歉，但寧瑠卻反而表示，對和女僕部打得不相上下的愛麗絲感興趣。另一方面，回到社團活動室的遊戲開發部一行人試著使用<鏡子>解讀<G.Bible>。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 战斗后，茜对任务失败一事向尼禄道歉，但尼禄却反而表示，对和女仆部打得不相上下的爱丽丝感兴趣。另一方面，回到社团活动室的游戏开发部一行人试着使用<镜子>解读<G.Bible>。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 战斗后，朱音对任务失败一事向宁瑠道歉，但宁瑠却反而表示，对和女仆部打得不相上下的爱丽丝感兴趣。另一方面，回到社团活动室的游戏开发部一行人试着使用<镜子>解读<G.Bible>。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 战斗后，朱音对任务失败一事向宁瑠道歉，但宁瑠却反而表示，对和女仆部打得不相上下的爱丽丝感兴趣。另一方面，回到社团活动室的游戏开发部一行人试着使用<镜子>解读<G.Bible>。

desc.en: Akane apologized for accepting the request and making everyone feel ashamed. Neru said the request was cancelled, and she was interested in Aris in particular. She instructed Asuna to find all the information about the Game Development Department.
desc.jp: Akane apologized for accepting the request and making everyone feel ashamed. Neru said the request was cancelled, and she was interested in Aris in particular. She instructed Asuna to find all the information about the Game Development Department.
desc.thai: Akane apologized for accepting the request and making everyone feel ashamed. Neru said the request was cancelled, and she was interested in Aris in particular. She instructed Asuna to find all the information about the Game Development Department.
desc.ko: Akane apologized for accepting the request and making everyone feel ashamed. Neru said the request was cancelled, and she was interested in Aris in particular. She instructed Asuna to find all the information about the Game Development Department.
desc.zh_tw: 朱音為接下該項委託給大家蒙羞抱歉，尼祿則表示大可不必，並表示委託已被取消。尼祿對愛麗絲特別感興趣，讓明日奈等人去查清遊戲開發部全員的資料。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 茜为接下该项委托给大家蒙羞抱歉，尼禄则表示大可不必，并表示委托已被取消。尼禄对爱丽丝特别感兴趣，让明日奈等人去查清游戏开发部全员的资料。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 朱音为接下该项委托给大家蒙羞抱歉，宁瑠则表示大可不必，并表示委托已被取消。宁瑠对爱丽丝特别感兴趣，让明日奈等人去查清游戏开发部全员的资料。

desc.en: Seminar's treasurer, Yuuka, intends to shut down the Game Development Department due to its lackluster performance. And so, Midori and Momoi head to the ruins in search of a secret weapon to prevent their club's closure.
desc.jp: Seminar's treasurer, Yuuka, intends to shut down the Game Development Department due to its lackluster performance. And so, Midori and Momoi head to the ruins in search of a secret weapon to prevent their club's closure.
desc.thai: Seminar's treasurer, Yuuka, intends to shut down the Game Development Department due to its lackluster performance. And so, Midori and Momoi head to the ruins in search of a secret weapon to prevent their club's closure.
desc.ko: Seminar's treasurer, Yuuka, intends to shut down the Game Development Department due to its lackluster performance. And so, Midori and Momoi head to the ruins in search of a secret weapon to prevent their club's closure.
desc.zh_tw: 研討會的會計優香，打算以遊戲開發部實績不佳為由關閉社團。綠和桃井為了反抗優香，便前往<廢墟>尋找秘密武器。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 研讨会的会计优香，打算以游戏开发部实绩不佳为由关闭社团。绿和桃井为了反抗优香，便前往<废墟>寻找秘密武器。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 研讨会的会计优香，打算以游戏开发部实绩不佳为由关闭社团。绿和桃井为了反抗优香，便前往<废墟>寻找秘密武器。

desc.en: Yuuka came to explain the situation, stating that the closure was inevitable. Momoi and Midori argued righteously, but was greeted with the mock of their only product - TSC, the very game that won the first place of The Worst Game of The Year.
desc.jp: Yuuka came to explain the situation, stating that the closure was inevitable. Momoi and Midori argued righteously, but was greeted with the mock of their only product - TSC, the very game that won the first place of The Worst Game of The Year.
desc.thai: Yuuka came to explain the situation, stating that the closure was inevitable. Momoi and Midori argued righteously, but was greeted with the mock of their only product - TSC, the very game that won the first place of The Worst Game of The Year.
desc.ko: Yuuka came to explain the situation, stating that the closure was inevitable. Momoi and Midori argued righteously, but was greeted with the mock of their only product - TSC, the very game that won the first place of The Worst Game of The Year.
desc.zh_tw: 優香前來解釋情況，表示廢社是板上釘釘的事情。桃井與綠據理力爭，但反遭優香冷嘲熱諷了一下社團的唯一成果——“年度垃圾遊戲排行榜第一名”的《故事·傳說·編年史》。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 优香前来解释情况，表示废社是板上钉钉的事情。桃井与绿据理力争，但反遭优香冷嘲热讽了一下社团的唯一成果——“年度垃圾游戏排行榜第一名”的《故事·传说·编年史》。

desc.en: When Yuuka started demanding them to take all the things out and calling them "just some junks", Momoi suddenly made it clear that they'll surely secure the Prize and be at the top one. Though time limited to only two short weeks, Yuuka finally agreed.
desc.jp: When Yuuka started demanding them to take all the things out and calling them "just some junks", Momoi suddenly made it clear that they'll surely secure the Prize and be at the top one. Though time limited to only two short weeks, Yuuka finally agreed.

desc.zh_tw: 就在優香讓兩人將東西全部清走，並稱它們為“亂七八糟的東西”時，桃井突然聲稱他們一定能在“千年大賞”上拿出成果、斬獲名次——但時間只有兩週。優香最後同意。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 就在优香让两人将东西全部清走，并称它们为“乱七八糟的东西”时，桃井突然声称他们一定能在“千年大赏”上拿出成果、斩获名次——但时间只有两周。优香最后同意。

desc.en: The situation is finally resolved. Rio vanishes, the C&C welcomes a new member, and the Game Development Department resumes development of their new project. Peace returns to Millennium.
desc.jp: The situation is finally resolved. Rio vanishes, the C&C welcomes a new member, and the Game Development Department resumes development of their new project. Peace returns to Millennium.
desc.thai: The situation is finally resolved. Rio vanishes, the C&C welcomes a new member, and the Game Development Department resumes development of their new project. Peace returns to Millennium.

desc.zh_tw: 事情告一段落。莉央消失不見，C&C則迎接新成員，遊戲開發部再次開始研發下一部作品。千年再次恢復和平的日常生活。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 事情告一段落。莉央消失不见，C&C则迎接新成员，游戏开发部再次开始研发下一部作品。千年再次恢复和平的日常生活。

desc.en: Rio decided to step down as the president after this incident. Though in great shock, Yuuka could only find a note left by the President, with "I'm sorry" on it.

desc.zh_tw: 莉央在此事後決定卸任會長一職，優香大為震撼。會長走前只留下了一條“對不起”的紙條。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央在此事后决定卸任会长一职，优香大为震撼。会长走前只留下了一条“对不起”的纸条。

desc.en: Sensei was called by the Game Development Department. The four said they were developing a new games, as they weren't able to come up more ideas for the old one. Aris invited Sensei to try with them, and everyone started the game happily. The story went on and on.

desc.zh_tw: 老師被叫到了遊戲開發部，眾人表示老師正在開發一款新的遊戲，因為之前的那個無法繼續擴充套件思路。愛麗絲邀請老師一起嘗試，眾人在愉快的氛圍下開始了遊戲。故事仍在續寫中。

desc.en: The Game Development Department and Sensei put their heads together to come up with ideas for their new game. When Momoi and Midori fail to find common ground, they decide to settle things once and for all using a method passed down in the Game Development Department through generations. Meanwhile, Yuzu gives Aris a quest to help her find inspiration. Aris ponders how to proceed with the quest when she decides to go on an adventure at the school with Sensei.

desc.zh_tw: 遊戲開發部和老師正在苦思要加入遊戲新作的創意。桃井和綠的意見發生分歧，兩人為了做出最後的結論，於是決定使用遊戲開發部代代相傳的方式決勝負。另一方面，柚子為了讓愛麗絲能獲得特別的靈感，於是給了她任務。苦思該如何執行任務的愛麗絲決定先和老師一起去學園冒險。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部和老师正在苦思要加入游戏新作的创意。桃井和绿的意见发生分歧，两人为了做出最后的结论，于是决定使用游戏开发部代代相传的方式决胜负。另一方面，柚子为了让爱丽丝能获得特别的灵感，于是给了她任务。苦思该如何运行任务的爱丽丝决定先和老师一起去学园冒险。

desc.en: The Game Development Club started discussing about the game. From the mechanics of the dungeon, to the weapon and arsenal, as well as the art and manifestations. Midori was in great dissatisfaction due to how much emphasis did Momoi put on art. And with the fact that she often changed ideas, many art resources were discarded too. The twins forced Sensei to make a decision.

desc.en: Aris and Sensei came to the campus. Aris said that both she and Sensei were "Beginner Heros", due to a small argument in which Momoi tries to put BOSSes right at the beginning of the game and was rejected. Aris wondered how to complete Yuzu's missions, and Sensei advised Aris to just go forward to see if anything happens.

desc.en: Sensei pays the Game Development Department a visit for the first time in a while. The members are fielding ideas for the development of their next project, but get distracted watching Aris playing a video game. Aris struggles mid-game upon encountering a cheating player, but gains a dramatic victory thanks to Yuzu's exhilarating performance. However, they fail to make any progress on plans for their next project, and decide to try again tomorrow.

desc.zh_tw: 老師久違地前往遊戲開發部部室。成員們為了研發下一部作品而集思廣益，但不知不覺卻變成了觀看愛麗絲玩遊戲。愛麗絲在遊戲過程中遇見作弊玩家並陷入苦戰，但因為柚子活躍的表現而獲得戲劇般的勝利。但下一部作品的企劃沒有任何進展，生活就和平常沒有兩樣。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师久违地前往游戏开发部部室。成员们为了研发下一部作品而集思广益，但不知不觉却变成了观看爱丽丝玩游戏。爱丽丝在游戏过程中遇见作弊玩家并陷入苦战，但因为柚子活跃的表现而获得戏剧般的胜利。但下一部作品的企划没有任何进展，生活就和平常没有两样。

desc.en: Sensei was invited to the Game Development Club, but somehow started playing fighting games with Momoi. Momoi wanted to continue playing, but was stopped by his sister Midori; it was at this time when Sensei got the know that he was invited to come up with new ideas for their next games.

desc.zh_tw: 老師受邀來到遊戲開發部，但不知不覺中就和桃井玩起了格鬥遊戲。桃井想繼續和老師玩下去，被妹妹綠攔了下來；這時老師才知道，桃井邀請他來是為了想出下一部遊戲的好點子。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师受邀来到游戏开发部，但不知不觉中就和桃井玩起了格斗游戏。桃井想继续和老师玩下去，被妹妹绿拦了下来；这时老师才知道，桃井邀请他来是为了想出下一部游戏的好点子。

desc.en: Momoi argues that the reason why she was playing, was exactly to attempt to analyze the game in the hope of some inspirations. Momoi purposed an mixture of multiple genres and hoped they could win the Millennium Prize by its uniqueness.
desc.jp: Momoi argues that the reason why she was playing, was exactly to attempt to analyze the game in the hope of some inspirations. Momoi purposed an mixture of multiple genres and hoped they could win the Millennium Prize by its uniqueness.

desc.zh_tw: 桃井指出剛剛之所以玩遊戲，正是為了試圖分析並從中獲得一些靈感。桃井的想法是將多種不同風格與型別的遊戲結合到一起，希望能夠藉由此種異類作品斬獲千年大獎。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 桃井指出刚刚之所以玩游戏，正是为了试图分析并从中获得一些灵感。桃井的想法是将多种不同风格与类型的游戏结合到一起，希望能够藉由此种异类作品斩获千年大奖。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 桃井指出刚刚之所以玩游戏，正是为了试图分析并从中获得一些灵感。桃井的想法是将多种不同风格与类型的游戏结合到一起，希望能够藉由此种异类作品斩获千年大奖。

desc.en: Himari maintained her own conclusion, and a disagreement took place. Rio tried to trap Himari with her AMAS, but Himari hacked the room and her AMAS and escaped successfully.

desc.zh_cn_jp: 日鞠固守着自己的结论，与莉央产生了严重分歧。莉央试图用AMAS将日鞠困住，但日鞠轻松骇入了房间和AMAS的系统，逃出了房间。

The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.

desc.en: Himari came to the corridor outside the room, talking to herself and making fun on how stubborn Rio was. But right at this moment Himari was firmly controlled by an unknown person - the fifth C&C member who existed only in rumors before.

desc.zh_tw: 陽葵來到房間外的走廊，自言自語笑話著莉央的固執。然而這時陽葵卻被一位不明人士——傳說中的第五位C&C成員——所牢牢控制住。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 日鞠来到房间外的走廊，自言自语笑话着莉央的固执。然而这时日鞠却被一位不明人士——传说中的第五位C&C成员——所牢牢控制住。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 阳葵来到房间外的走廊，自言自语笑话着莉央的固执。然而这时阳葵却被一位不明人士——传说中的第五位C&C成员——所牢牢控制住。

desc.en: The ending song of the short animation "beautiful day dreamer" about the Game Development Department, sung by the fours of the GDD. The song has two versions, one is two-minute long and the other one is four; the former is used at the end of both the animation and the Episode 25, Chapter 2, Volume 2 in-game.
desc.jp: The ending song of the short animation "beautiful day dreamer" about the Game Development Department, sung by the fours of the GDD. The song has two versions, one is two-minute long and the other one is four; the former is used at the end of both the animation and the Episode 25, Chapter 2, Volume 2 in-game.

desc.zh_cn: 官方游戏开发部短篇动画《beautiful day dreamer》中的片尾曲，由游戏开发部四人演唱。该歌曲由两分钟及四分钟两个版本，其中前者用于动画末尾曲与游戏内第二篇第二章的结尾曲。
